Title: mapApply
Description: Applies a function to each element of a map.
Returns a map obtained from the original map by application of func(map1[i], ..., mapN[i]) for each element.
Examples: SELECT mapApply((k, v) -> (k, v * 10), _map) AS rFROM(    SELECT map('key1', number, 'key2', number * 2) AS _map    FROM numbers(3))
